entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
